item.description:
Many of us have been Looking forward to the day when this new Grocery Co-Op will open in Downtown New Haven.  Wednesday Afternoon, they are finally cutting the ribbon on Elm City Market!

The Ribbon Cutting ceremony will take place starting at 4:30 pm, and will be followed by a First Night Celebration from 5 pm to 7 pm.  If you Can't make it for 4:30, don't worry just come check it out after!

Everyone can enter the market following the Ribbon Cutting where there will be local live music and samples around the store. 

Members of the Co-Op are also invited to start shopping a day early, before the ceremony.  The Store will open for sales to the whole public Starting on Thursday.

A.J. will be running over to catch this event after work and mingle for the first little while (at least) of the party.  You can attempt to reach him at 315-345-9348.  If it's during the ceremony then texting may be better than calling.

If there is significant interest we can grab a drink or munchies at a near by location after.

For Parking you can look for street meetered parking, or the 360 Garage will be open for Credit/Debit Card customers only.  If you shop at Elm City Market, you can bring your ticket and get it validated for one hour of parking, and a special rate after that.  (When validated $1 for additional 30 minutes, $2 for an additional hour.)

For those that need more location guidance:  Elm City Market is located in the bottom floor of the 360 State Street Building, located at the corner of Chapel Street and State Street in Downtown New Haven.

If you're a "Maybe" for this event, just put that in your RSVP comment.
item.how_to_find_us: AJ will be there mingling. If you need to reach him 315-345-9348, Texting might be better considering the event nature but you can call.
item.name: Elm City Market Ribbon Cutting / First Night Celebration
